name: Rollup-as-a-Service Pattern
description: Deploy custom rollups easily via managed platforms. App-specific chains with Ethereum security.
when_to_use: App-specific chains, custom L2s, blockchain customization
benefits: Easy deployment, customizable, base layer security, no devops
drawbacks: Vendor dependency, fragmentation, DA solution needed
use_cases: Gaming chains, DeFi-specific rollups, high-throughput apps
